plot: Childrens Games Show set in Alton Towers Theme Park. Two teams of school children compete each week on a giant Snakes & Ladders board for the prizes of free rides on the attractions.
title: Hold Tight!
plot_es: Childrens Games Show set in Alton Towers Theme Park. Two teams of school children compete each week on a giant Snakes & Ladders board for the prizes of free rides on the attractions.
